reply:
OMG, I'm so hyped about this opportunity 🎉👏! I've been brainstorming ideas for a short film for ages, and now's the perfect chance to bring it to life 🎬💡. The prizes are insane - $10,000 cash grant, production, and mentorship from Oscar-winning judges? 🤯 Yes, please! 🙌

I'm definitely submitting my script and I hope to see many talented writers do the same 📝👫. The deadline is April 15th, so let's get writing (and rewriting, and editing...) ⏰💻! Clicking that link in bio ASAP 🔗👉.

Good luck to everyone entering, and I hope to see some amazing shorts come out of this
post_text:
